about_the_game:
Four collections of the music from the classic games (we’re counting the latest game in there) from the original composer, George Stamatiadis, with over 6 hours of TY music.
All your favorite tracks in one handy place, this pack is the combination of all previously released TY the Tasmanian Tiger soundtracks, and includes bonus tracks not available anywhere else.

TY the Tasmanian Tiger 1 OST Steam Edition

  • Main Theme

Four collections of the music from the classic games (we’re counting the latest game in there) from the original composer, George Stamatiadis, with over 6 hours of TY music.

name: TY the Tasmanian Tiger 4 - The Soundtrack Collection

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: TY the Tasmanian Tiger 4 - The Soundtrack Collection - $19.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy TY the Tasmanian Tiger 4 - The Soundtrack Collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8/8.1 (32bit and 64bit), Windows® 10 (32bit and 64bit)
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Intel® Pentium® 4 or 1.8 GHz AMD Athlon™ 64 3000+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 6800GT or AMD Radeon X1950 Pro (256MB VRAM with Shader Model 3.0 or higher)
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compliant
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8/8.1 (32bit and 64bit), Windows® 10 (32bit and 64bit)
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Intel® Pentium® 4 or 1.8 GHz AMD Athlon™ 64 3000+
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 6800GT or AMD Radeon X1950 Pro (256MB VRAM with Shader Model 3.0 or higher)
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compliant

short_description: The complete sound selection from all your favorite TY games (which is all of them, right?) from original composer George Stamatiadis, with over 6 hours of TY music.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
